content: That sounds great! I think I'll go with "Thanks for being an amazing colleague!" since it's short, sweet, and directly from the heart. I'll make sure to check the preview carefully and maybe add a small icon to make it more visually appealing. By the way, speaking of gifts, I just got a beautiful silver necklace for my best friend's birthday today, and it was around $70, which is a bit more than I usually spend, but it was a special occasion.
